overview.base:
You summon a magical item for the duration of this effect. The item is the same every time, but is unique to you. The type of item is determined by the GM. The item has F number of abilities. The GM decides what these abilities are based on your character's behavior, actions, and personal development. As you increase in LVL, the item gets more and more detailed. The item uses 1 presence tier.

Upon summoning, the item appears in your hand (if you would hold it) and is instantly attuned and equipped. You must be able to Attune the item and be able to use it in order to summon it.

If the item is ever shattered, you die. If it is ever destroyed, you die and your body is ruined.
